title: NeuroCareAI
desc: I developed a fast, optimized AI model with a unique architecture that accurately segments 3D brain tumors from low-quality 2D MRI scans, even with missing sequences, achieving 93% precision validated by real patient data and expert medical feedback. I built a complete ecosystem around it, including a robust API, a WebGL-based web app for 3D visualization and job management, and a desktop app with advanced features. Iâ€™m preparing to outsource the full codebase and documentation to enable wider access, collaboration, and integration into clinical workflows to improve diagnostics and patient outcomes.

title: U2Net BodyMeasurment
desc: Human Body Measurement from Image using AI.

title: MiniDEL Pseudo Compiler
desc: Pseudo-language compiler (lexer/parser/semantic analyzer) built with Lex, Bison, and C (binaries only), with integrated editor.

title: QuakeGuard
desc: This is an API that allows EarthQuake detection using an Arduino Vibration Sensor Or Dedicated Hardware (Prototyping using Wifi and Bluetooth)

title: Machine Learning Library (MLZ)
desc: A machine learning library built from scratch using Numpy. It provides an environment for developing custom layers and activation methods, supporting classical NNs and CNNs while expanding for additional tools.

title: MAJESTY
desc: An e-commerce API featuring 3D product previews generated from multi-angle images processed with photogrammetry algorithms. Includes shop and order management systems with statistics.

title: Encrypted Chat System
desc: An encrypted chat system with integrated VPN and proxy and customizable UI features. Includes API integration.

title: SDL Raycaster
desc: A basic raycaster implemented using the SDL library based on techniques from the DOOM game. It renders maps defined by a 2D array.
